title: Sweet and Pampered Military Marriage: Spare Me, Commander! - Novel Updates
tags: Appearance Changes   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Devoted Love Interests   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Past Plays a Big Role   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   Reincarnation   Revenge   R*pe   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Smart Couple   Ugly to Beautiful   Underestimated Protagonist   Wealthy Characters
author: 南流风
description:
She was fat and dark with a face full of acne in her previous life, but he still ate her. Just how deeply did he love her?

But she couldn’t understand his sincerity. She wholeheartedly loved the slag man instead and ended up blind and paralyzed.

After her rebirth, she realizes that the acne and dark skin on her face was due to her sister adding something “extra” to her makeup.

In this lifetime, she will stay away from the slag man, lose weight, and restore her face. She regains her slim and seductive figure and her stunning beauty.  She cherishes her husband’s sincere pampering, abuses the slags with him hand-in-hand, and gives birth to a “bun…….”>
